title: polygon-erigon  No block headers to write
body:
#### System information

thorax/erigon:stable
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
centos


Erigon Command (with flags/config):
docker run -d -p 30303:30303 -p 8545:8545 -v /data/erigon-polygon:/opt/erigon/polygon -it thorax/erigon:stable --chain=bor-mainnet --prune=hrtc --bor.heimdall=https://192.168.11.185:1317 --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool --maxpeers=250 --snapshots=false --datadir=/opt/erigon/polygon --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --metrics --metrics.addr=0.0.0.0 --db.size.limit=10TB --db.pagesize=16kb --torrent.upload.rate=312mb --torrent.download.rate=312mb --clique.datadir=/opt/erigon/polygon/clique --port=30303 --metrics.port=6060 --ethash.dagdir=/opt/erigon/ethash/dag --log.console.verbosity=info


Chain/Network: 
bor-miannet polygon
